headline: XRP Price Holds Firm as Ripple Wins Major UK Regulatory License
summary: The famous Bitcoin four-year cycle is losing its grip, according to several market analysts tracking the latest post-halving data. BTC USD failed to deliver its usual explosive rally, rising about +43% after the 2024 halving, while price momentum faded into late 2025 as its key $100k level was lost. That ...

headline: How BlackRock, Revolut and finance firms bolster their crypto positions in 2026
summary: Financial firms are muscling into crypto. BlackRock and Revolut are both recruiting for crypto roles.

headline: Why The Narrative Around PayPal Holdings PYPL Is Shifting After New AI And Q3 Updates
summary: Analysts recently reset their blended fair value estimate for PayPal Holdings from about US$82.00 to roughly US$76.75, reflecting slightly more cautious assumptions in the latest models. The main shifts sit in the discount rate and long term revenue growth outlook, where a slightly higher required return and trimmed top line expectations line up with mixed views on branded volume trends, consumer spending signals, and ongoing competitive pressure, even as newer partnerships and AI initiatives...

headline: Microsoft brings PayPal-powered checkout to Copilot AI shopping
summary: The service will debut on Copilot.com in the US, with further deployment planned across other Copilot-enabled channels.

headline: AI poised to aid payments operations
summary: Shopper bots grab headlines but autonomous AI is likely to transform many business functions, a Deloitte report suggests.
